text: How to finance? Good news - pvt investment is going to collapse anyway, so some headroom wud be there in savings. Bad news - w/the lockdown, money multiplier⬇️-> Savings⬇️ -> headline itself will be constrained. Alternative - RBI buys G-Sec. Even deficit financing - its not porn.
